The first collection about this subject was uploaded back in August 2009. Here in this upload are another 14 titles:

- Hoosley - Crusading in the Fifteenth Century; Message and Impact (2004)

- Madden - Crusades; The Illustrated History (2004)

- The Oxford History of the Crusades (1999)
